Title: Today people are buzzing about the Australian government's big move to tackle cyber threats with a substantial amount of money. Meanwhile Agriculture Minister Murray Watt is looking for solutions in raising fees and charges for importers to improve biosecurity standards. In other news the Tasmanian Premier Jeremy Rockliff is pushing for the construction of a new stadium for a local team in the AFL competition. Also live coverage from recent events includes the Prime Minister's attendance at the wedding of shock jock radio DJ Kyle Sandilands and The Greens' efforts to block interest rate hikes and freeze rents.
